graph_title: Prevalence of malnutrition (weight for height >+2 or <-2 standard deviation from the median of the WHO Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age, by type (wasting and overweight)
indicator_name: Prevalence of malnutrition (weight for height >+2 or <-2 standard deviation from the median of the WHO Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age, by type (wasting and overweight)
target_name: Entro il 2030, eliminare tutte le forme di malnutrizione, incluso il raggiungimento, entro il 2025, degli obiettivi concordati a livello internazionale sull’arresto della crescita e il deperimento dei bambini sotto i 5 anni di età, e soddisfare le esigenze nutrizionali di ragazze adolescenti, in gravidanza, in allattamento e delle persone anziane
indicator_name_national: Prevalence of malnutrition (weight for height >+2 or <-2 standard deviation from the median of the WHO Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age, by type (wasting and overweight)
